about_the_game:
Step into a world where every creak of the floorboard could be your last. In Phantom's Estate, you and your team of paranormal investigators are thrust into haunted locations to uncover the truth about restless spirits. Armed with your wits, specialized equipment, and a dose of courage, you'll explore eerie environments, gather clues, and attempt to solve the mystery before you become the hunted.

But beware—the deeper you dig, the more dangerous it becomes. The spirits lurking in these haunted estates are far from friendly. As your sanity slips away, the world around you warps, twisting the lines between reality and the paranormal. The lower your sanity, the more aggressive the spirits get, until you find yourself not just investigating a haunting, but surviving one.

Will you be able to identify the ghost and escape with your life, or will you become just another tragic story on the estate's long list of victims?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (1.10 GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: A microphone is advised but not necessary
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (4th gen or higher) or AMD Ryzen 5 (quad-core, 2.0 GHz or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX 560 or equivalent (for better graphics performance)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: A microphone is advised but not necessary

short_description: Phantom's Estate is a Survival Horror game where you have the choice of going in solo, or gathering your friends to hunt for the dead. Be aware though as these ghosts have been reported to track and learn your mistakes while you explore...
